name: Danger! My shield bites!
description:
Created in three days for ZenoJam 6

Sorry, our game was not easy. The hero will die, your task is to try to make him stronger with the help of the shield's ability to devour enemy forces and useful items, digest them and transfer them to the hero. Good luck!

---

Control and features:

F - BiteBack (shield`s ability);
WASD - move, attack;
Space - wait;
Esc - pause.

Become Stronger - Anew with the current stats.
Become Free - Reset stats and start over.

- If the slime does not move, then you do not cause damage to it (armor does not break through).
- The shield can eat negative stats.

---

Known bugs and flaws:

- Enemy stats at the level are not displayed in the interface (not implemented).
- The last level leads to the first level. This means that you have won! (the victory screen is not implemented).
- Devouring the "Max HP" stat does not work correctly.

---

The Knight of Light is enslaved by the dark force. The Shield of Death on his arm is a devil's toy that cannot be disposed of. However, only with his help will he be able to get out of this Cursed Tower. The path to light lies through darkness...
